company.name: Be Free Tours
company.tagline: Your Rio, Your Way - Private Tours Since 2013
company.description: Premium private tour operator in Rio de Janeiro specializing in personalized experiences with certified local guides

city_tours.name: Unforgettable Rio
city_tours.description: Full-day comprehensive tour: Christ the Redeemer, Sugarloaf Mountain, Santa Teresa, Selarón Steps, Royal Portuguese Reading Room, Metropolitan Cathedral

city_tours.name: Rio Express 5h
city_tours.description: Quick tour of Rio's two icons: Christ the Redeemer and Sugarloaf Mountain

city_tours.name: Sunrise at Sugarloaf
city_tours.description: Magical sunrise from Sugarloaf Mountain followed by early-morning Christ visit

city_tours.name: Sunset Magic
city_tours.description: Golden hour at Christ, spectacular sunset from Sugarloaf

day_trips.name: Ilha Grande Speedboat Adventure
day_trips.description: Private speedboat exploration of pristine tropical island with 100+ beaches

day_trips.name: Búzios Beach Peninsula
day_trips.description: Sophisticated beach town with 23 beaches, Mediterranean charm, boutiques and restaurants

day_trips.name: Petrópolis Imperial City
day_trips.description: Mountain escape to Brazil's former summer capital with palaces and cool climate

walking_tours.name: Historical Downtown Walking Tour
walking_tours.description: Explore Rio's historic center: Theatro Municipal, Selarón Steps, Confeitaria Colombo, Metropolitan Cathedral

walking_tours.name: Food Walking Tour
walking_tours.description: Taste 8-10 authentic Brazilian dishes at local spots where Cariocas eat

walking_tours.name: Little Africa Heritage Tour
walking_tours.description: Explore Rio's African-Brazilian history at UNESCO's Cais do Valongo

custom.description: Fully customizable private tours based on your interests, pace, and preferences

faqs_quick_answers.What's included?: Private transportation, certified guide, all entrance tickets, hotel pickup/drop-off, water
faqs_quick_answers.Best time for Christ?: Early morning (6:30-8am) or late afternoon (after 3pm) for fewer crowds
faqs_quick_answers.Skip-the-line access?: Yes, for Sugarloaf Mountain on all tours. Christ uses official channels with strategic timing
faqs_quick_answers.Good for cruise passengers?: Yes! Rio Express 5h designed for cruise schedules with guaranteed on-time return
faqs_quick_answers.Can you customize tours?: Absolutely! All tours are private and fully customizable
faqs_quick_answers.Payment when?: After booking confirmation. 50% deposit for tours over $500
faqs_quick_answers.Cancellation?: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before tour
faqs_quick_answers.Safe?: Yes, our local guides know safe areas and times. We provide safety briefings

not_ideal_for: Solo travelers looking to meet others (private only)
when_to_suggest_alternatives: If budget is primary concern → suggest free walking tours or public transport
If wanting to meet other travelers → suggest group tours or hostel tours
If only interested in one attraction → suggest taking Uber/taxi independently
